subject: Feature suggestions from Purrview are too generic
description: When asking the agentic interface for improvement recommendations, the suggestions are overly generic and not actionable.

subject: Unable to retrieve answers from Google Docs
description: When asking Purrview to summarize information from my Google Docs, some documents are not being read or included in the results.

subject: Answers incomplete or missing context
description: Purrview sometimes provides answers to my questions that lack important details from emails or notes.
